variants.title: Single Expand
variants.summary: Only one panel open; roving focus keeps triggers keyboard reachable.

props.name: type
props.notes: Collapses the previously opened item whenever a new value is set.

props.name: collapsible
props.notes: Allows closing the active panel so all items can remain collapsed.

variants.title: Multiple Expand
variants.summary: Checkbox-like toggling that leaves several panels open simultaneously.

props.name: type
props.notes: Wrapper exposes array value helpers for controlled and uncontrolled usage.

props.name: defaultValue
props.notes: Illustrates bootstrapping with more than one expanded panel.

variants.title: Compact Density
variants.summary: Reduced spacing + typography for sidebars, drawers, or mobile accordions.

props.name: density
props.notes: Maps to density tokens in `src/themes/density.ts` for Tailwind bridge work.

props.name: itemLabels
props.type: Array<{ value: string; trigger: ReactNode; content: ReactNode; disabled?: boolean; }>
props.description: Ordered list of accordion sections rendered by the wrapper.
props.accessibility: Keep trigger labels unique and descriptive so announcements convey panel purpose.

props.name: type
props.description: Controls whether one or many items may be expanded at a time.
props.accessibility: Single mode mimics radio-group semantics; multiple mode mirrors checkbox semantics.

props.name: value
props.description: Controlled value(s) that determine which panels are expanded.
props.accessibility: Keep value state in sync with visual indicators so screen reader users hear accurate status.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: Uncontrolled initial selection when the wrapper manages open items internally.
props.accessibility: Set defaults that leave the first focusable trigger visible for keyboard users.

props.name: collapsible
props.description: Whether the active item in single mode can be collapsed.
props.accessibility: Document the behavior so assistive technology users know if closing the last panel is possible.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables all triggers and prevents toggling.
props.accessibility: Disabled triggers should be removed from tab order unless design requires them to remain focusable.

a11y: Triggers render as <button> elements with aria-controls linking to their panels.
Heading slots keep the document outline intact (default h3 but overrideable).
Panels expose role='region' and aria-labelledby attributes for clear announcements.
interactions: ArrowDown moves focus to the next enabled trigger.
ArrowUp moves focus to the previous enabled trigger.
Home/End jump to the first/last trigger.
Space/Enter toggle the focused item open or closed.
Esc collapses the active panel when single-mode is set to collapsible.
agentNotes: Reach for this when presenting vertically stacked FAQs, settings, onboarding steps, or mobile navigation clusters. Pair with search/filter inputs for long lists. When Tailwind styles land, map density/variant tokens to utility classes and document responsive behavior. Warn agents when async content is loaded so they delay focus handoff until panels render.
